frontMatter.title: FOQS: Scaling a distributed priority queue
frontMatter.summary: Facebook Ordered Queueing Service (FOQS) supports the asynchronous computing workloads that run many of Facebook’s services at scale.

next.title: Coding for SSDs – Part 1: Introduction and Table of Contents
next.summary: I want to make solid-state drives (SSDs) the optimal storage solution for my key-value store project. For that reason, I had to make sure I fully understood how SSDs work
